name: Mavka
movement: walks at a speed of 30 feet
description: The Mavka is a Medium undead creature with strong offensive capabilities, often mounted on a nightmare. It features dark and undead characteristics, with an imposing presence.
memorable: Its combination of regeneration, powerful spells, and combat versatility makes the Mavka a significant threat, especially when mounted on its nightmare.
goals: Typically seeks to cause chaos and destruction, using its abilities to dominate the battlefield.
relations: Often associated with nightmares and other evil undead creatures.
environment: Likely to be found in dark or cursed areas, avoiding sunlight.
strengths: Immunity to necrotic and poison damage, and able to regenerate health through attacks.
weaknesses: Severe vulnerability to sunlight causing radiant damage and disadvantage on attacks.
attacks: Utilizes two Enervating Slam melee attacks and three Necrotic Bolt ranged spell attacks, along with devastating fire abilities when mounted.
most_powerful_ability: The ability to unleash Flame Burst, dealing significant fire damage to multiple targets at once.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 90 feet and a passive Perception of 15.
skills: Skilled in Athletics, capable in Nature, and perceptive with notable proficiency in Perception.
additional_information: Regains health based on necrotic damage dealt by attacks.
Can cast multiple spells to manipulate the battlefield.
The nightmare mount adds mobility and additional attack options.
Exempts the Mavka from the need for air, food, drink, or sleep.
Suffers significant penalties in sunlight, making its environment crucial.
spellcasting: Can cast a variety of spells, including darkness and other utility spells to control combat scenarios.
test_queries: dark evil undead that can regenerate
creature that is weak to sunlight
chaotic undead with mobility and spells
